Merge-It
# Merge Reference Design Systems Into New Form

Take the style guides and the follow ups on their philosophy and how to use them, found here: design-system/styles.md

Fuse your analysis with the app idea below, and then wrap your thoughts in "Pontificating" H2 tags and place them at the top of the file. After you're done, output an updated Style Guide based on the app below.

The app idea to adapt for:

# CHANGE_ME #
We are building a consumer-focused fitness and wellness mobile app that helps users plan and track workouts, log meals, manage a calendar of sessions, and engage with a supportive community. The product prioritizes clear information hierarchy, warm but minimal visual design, and fast, scannable screens to help users stay consistent with their health goals.

# Output #
Place your output in a file called styles-new.md
